definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The first day of school our professor introduced a little old lady to us.
sentences.chinese: 開學第一天，教授把一位小個子老太太介紹給了我們。

sentences.english: The company has 2 subsidiaries and 4 collecting and warehouses.
sentences.chinese: 公司下設2個子企業和4個收儲分庫。

sentences.english: The little man stirred the coals again and blew on them to make them burn brighter.
sentences.chinese: 小個子又攪了攪煤渣並吹着氣讓它們燃燒得更旺一點。

sentences.english: A little man got off the horse's back .
sentences.chinese: 一位小個子的男士跨下馬背。

sentences.english: Tom is the tallest boy in his basketball team.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是他們籃球隊中個子最高的孩子。

sentences.english: He nearly ran into a large man who suddenly came in through the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 他差點與一位突然闖進的大個子男人撞個滿懷。

sentences.english: If you're a big guy, your casual shoes will look best with a thicker sole.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一個大個子，你的休閒鞋將最好的厚唯一。

sentences.english: He was a short bald man with a big spare tyre and smelled of cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 他是個矮個子禿頭，腰間一圈贅肉，渾身煙味。

sentences.english: The big man slipped his sword back in its sheath.
On average, children at present are much taller than those fifty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，現在的孩子比五十年前的孩子個子高多了。

sentences.english: Her high height sets her apart from her sisters.
sentences.chinese: 高高的個子使她在其姊妹中分外引人注目。

sentences.english: I am not tall enough to put my over-coat up there in the over-head compartment.
sentences.chinese: 我個子不夠高，無法把大衣放進上面的置物箱裏。

sentences.english: The Cavaliers ' starting bigs are both teetering on the edge of oblivion.
sentences.chinese: 騎士的首發大個子湊處於逐漸被遺忘的邊緣。

sentences.english: So because of my height, in school, they would give me the ball.
sentences.chinese: 所以在學校裏他們會因爲我的個子高而把球傳給我。

sentences.english: My body fits on it, but barely upon it, there's no room for my big Cornish head.
sentences.chinese: 從前在康沃爾有個大個子，他的身高要長過自己的牀。

sentences.english: Do you mean the tall gentleman with fair hair and with glasses?
sentences.chinese: 吧檯您說的是那位高個子，黃頭髮，戴眼鏡的先生嗎？

definition: attractiveness index (rating of how good-looking sb is)
